overview: C3 is an Evangelical church that opened in Toronto in 2013, quickly amassing a large following amongst the cityâ€™s young, hip and tattooed. #BLESSED offers an intimate look inside this fast-growing millennial church and follows the process of selling salvation in the 21st century as Pastor Sam and his team grow the church from two locations to three, living out their mission to save as many Torontonian souls as possible.
title: #BLESSED
